did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: La voz de la sangre paisajes y leyendas del distrito de Altar circa 1960-1969
did.abstract: Photocopy of typescript compilation of legends and historic accounts, as told to Carmela Reyna de León by her family and friends living in the Altar region of Sonora, Mexico. A few song verses are present. Also included is a photocopied letter, with translation, written by the author to Norman Simons of Tucson, Ariz., dated Oct. 5, 1965. It concerns the possible translation of this volume.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Mexican author who witnessed the Revolution.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized by individual stories.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Photocopy of typescript compilation of legends and historic accounts, as told to Carmela Reyna de León by her family and friends living in the Altar region of Sonora, Mexico. A few song verses are present. Also included is a photocopied letter, with translation, written by the author to Norman Simons of Tucson, Ariz., dated Oct. 5, 1965. It concerns the possible translation of this volume.
Pages for photographic illustrations of people and places have the descriptive labels, but the images are not present in this copy.
